responseText: Woo! That wind off the mountaintops is telling me it's likely to snow up here soon. How prepared are you for that kind of weather? Take a minute to stitch a nice shirt together and you'll be that much warmer come the rain and snow, you know? I'll be here to look over your work when you've finished.
name: ANV_FTUE_Artisan_Dunir_RoricStonewool_9_Response
